value:
I couldn't ask for better opponents...$k$pMúspell's passion, Lyn's technique,
Mordecai's strength... Even Tana and
Peony have impressed me!

Kagero and I practice our sumo skills
all the time. The only downside is the
crowd that always seems to gather...

Don't forget to visit the festival's food
stalls. Your muscles need fuel to be
at their best, so eat up!

You up for a match? I always have
time to practice, so long as you come
at me with everything you have!

To think we could host the festival of
flames right here in Askr...$k$pI'm going to do everything in my
power to make it a rousing success!

You're $Nu, right?$k$pYou should stop by the festival of
flames we're holding over at
$Nf's castle.

I won't let anyone tarnish the spirit of
the Flame Tribe—not now, not ever!
Good. I'm ready for the next round!

Rrgh... It seems my footing
needs work...

Thank you. I look forward to honing
my skills with this.

I am Rinkah, of the Flame Tribe. We
hold the festival of flames to show
our strength, and this is no exception.

The Flame Tribe has traditionally kept
outsiders at arm's length. I've found
making friends to be...arduous.$k$pBut if they are simply competitors,
I'll take on as many as I can without
a second thought.$k$pAfter all, if I only ever trained on my
own, how could I check how much
progress I was making?$k$pYet, there is also the thrill of facing a
powerful opponent and knowing
victory will take everything you have.$k$pNeedless to say, I like to test myself
against others, since it benefits both
me and my opponent.$k$pAll right, that's enough of chatter.
Daylight's burning, and we still need
to train until our muscles ache!
You won't outmuscle me!
I'll take you down!
Over so soon?
Isn't this exciting?!
Hit the dirt…
I am Rinkah, and I won't be bested in sumo.
Hands off! No shoving until we're in the ring!
Sumo is a time-honored test of mettle for members of the Flame Tribe.
In sumo, it's important to dress lightly so your opponent has less to grab on to. Remember that.
Your grip is too loose! This may be practice, but you'll never win unless you give it your all.
The spirit of the Flame Tribe is always with me, no matter where I go.
Thank you for practicing with me. When I win the tournament, we can split the earnings!
Square up!
Step to it!
This one's mine.
